Meta.title: Resume Hirun | AI Engineer & Full Stack Developer
Meta.description: Portfolio of Hirun - AI Engineer and Full Stack Developer specializing in LLM, Modern Web, and Machine Learning.

Hero.name: Hirun Chatcharoensawat
Hero.description: Passionate about AI, continuously expanding my knowledge, and eager to apply the latest advancements to real-world projects. Currently focusing on Large Language Models (LLMs).

About.title: About Me
About.description: I am an AI Engineer and Full Stack Developer with a strong passion for Artificial Intelligence, specifically Large Language Models (LLMs). I combine this with modern web development expertise to build innovative and impactful solutions.

exp1.desc: Tested Alphalink systems, Optimized web performance, UX/UI Design (Figma), and developed auction web platform.

exp2.desc: Full Stack Dev, Prompt Engineering, Database Architecture, utilised AI CLI & MCP tools.

exp3.desc: Developed financial and tax calculation websites.

exp4.desc: Developed university assessment systems and analyzed evaluation data.

proj1.title: Smart Recipe Recommender
proj1.desc: Recipe recommendation system based on available ingredients using Content-based filtering. Built Thai recipe datasets and integrated database for user preferences.

proj2.title: Trading Tax & Cash Flow Calculator
proj2.desc: Automated tax calculation and deduction system for buy/sell activities. Tracks daily trading transactions and monitors cash flow (inflow/outflow).

proj3.title: News Website Maintenance
proj3.desc: Enhanced UX/navigation to improve usability and upgraded system architecture to support modern web technologies for a news platform.

proj4.title: Sales Data Analysis
proj4.desc: Analyzed sales data for promotional campaigns and export strategies. Used Kaggle datasets and compared ML models (Decision Trees) to evaluate effectiveness.

Contact.title: Get in Touch
Contact.subtitle: Interested in working together or have a question? Feel free to reach out.
